prompt: A dark and vibrant fantasy art piece depicting an eerie swamp shrouded in mist. In the foreground, ghostly will-o'-wisps float above the murky waters, casting an otherworldly blue-green glow. Ancient, gnarled trees draped in glowing vines form a canopy overhead, with mysterious magical symbols faintly visible in the mist. The scene is both enchanting and foreboding, with light and shadow creating a mystical ambiance.
